name: mern-book-search
description: This week, youâ€™ll take starter code with a fully functioning Google Books API search engine built with a RESTful API, and refactor it to be a GraphQL API built with Apollo Server. The app was built using the MERN stack with a React front end, MongoDB database, and Node.js/Express.js server and API.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && nodemon server.js" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.render-build: npm install && npm run build && cd server && npm install
